## ‚öôÔ∏è Installation

This theme is distributed on [PyPI][pypi] and can be installed with `pip`:

```shell
pip install sphinx-godot
```

To use the theme in your Sphinx project, you will need to edit your `conf.py` file‚Äôs `html_theme` setting:

```python
html_theme = "godot"
```
